answers.answer: I too have just found out that I have gestational diabetes. I now have to book an appointment to meet with a specialist to monitor the rest of my pregnancy.  This is so discouraging because I also have a heart murmur that I also developed during pregnancy.  Can't take anymore bad news.
It's crazy my other two pregnancy were totally different and healthy this one seems to be bringing on alsorts,  its scary isn't it huni x

question: So i have gd so worrying :( got to go back hospital on Tuesday to see specialist, dietian,  diabetes Dr, and Midwife got to see if I need tablets, insulin or just a blood monitor...
title: Gtt came back paired..
